author: adityapatwardhan
body:
## Steps to reproduce

Execute tests in AppVeyor daily builds. The test https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Management/Start-Process.Tests.ps1#L66 fails. 
## Expected behavior

Test should pass.
## Actual behavior

The test fails as the output file is not generated.
## Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

``` powershell
> $PSVersionTable
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSEdition                      Core
CLRVersion
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-alpha.10-98-g877c193af0ea79f8b3e15528aeb144fef9305305-dirty
WSManStackVersion              3.0
PSVersion                      6.0.0-alpha
```
title: Start-Process test for stdin redirection fails only on AppVeyor daily builds
